payload.title: EventBus Types System - Complete Type Safety
payload.description: Implement complete type system for EventBus with 9 GitGovernance event types, BaseEvent foundation, GitGovEvent union type, EventHandler types, and EventSubscription types. Convert all interfaces to types for consistency.
payload.notes: Complete type system implemented with 9 event types: TaskCreated/StatusChanged, CycleCreated/StatusChanged, ExecutionCreated, FeedbackCreated/StatusChanged, ChangelogCreated, SystemDailyTick. All types converted from interfaces to type aliases for consistency. Full type safety with union types and generic constraints.
